# proof of concept for implementing grammar of graphics in base plot

```{r}
library(bbplot)

p = bbplot(mtcars, list(x='mpg', y='disp'))
p1 = p %>% ly_point
p2 = p %>% ly_lm
p3 = p %>% ly_point %>% ly_lm(col='blue')
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
p; p1; p2; p3
```
